pullRequest.title: IEEE: fix generator active power limits default value
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Geoffroy Jamgotchian geoffroy.jamgotchian@rte-france.com
Please check if the PR fulfills these requirements (please use '[x]' to check the checkboxes, or submit the PR and then click the checkboxes)

 The commit message follows our guidelines
 Tests for the changes have been added (for bug fixes / features)
 Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)

Does this PR already have an issue describing the problem ? If so, link to this issue using '#XXX' and skip the rest
No
What kind of change does this PR introduce? (Bug fix, feature, docs update, ...)
Bug fix
What is the current behavior? (You can also link to an open issue here)
There is no generator active power limits in IEEE CDF format. Min/max value is set to +-Double.MAX_VALUE. The problem is that in case of loadflow and distributed slack, the computed factor are totally wrong (because we at some point, we sum all participation factors that are closed to double max value...).
What is the new behavior (if this is a feature change)?
We set min/max active power to -+9999 like in UCTE importer.
Does this PR introduce a breaking change or deprecate an API? If yes, check the following:

 The Breaking Change or Deprecated label has been added
 The migration guide has been updated in the github wiki (What changes might users need to make in their application due to this PR?)

Other information:
(if any of the questions/checkboxes don't apply, please delete them entirely)

commit.message:
Fix generator active power limits default value

Signed-off-by: Geoffroy Jamgotchian <geoffroy.jamgotchian@rte-france.com>

nodes.bodyText: These values of minQ and maxQ are really strange. It seems to be default values. What have we planned to do with default values management in IIDM ? Do we need a global strategy ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@
             <iidm:busBreakerTopology>
                 <iidm:bus id="B1" name="BUS-1   100" v="1.04" angle="0.0"/>
             </iidm:busBreakerTopology>
-            <iidm:generator id="B1-G" energySource="OTHER" minP="-1.7976931348623157E308" maxP="1.7976931348623157E308" voltageRegulatorOn="true" targetP="71.64102" targetV="1.04" targetQ="27.04592" bus="B1" connectableBus="B1">
+            <iidm:generator id="B1-G" energySource="OTHER" minP="-9999.0" maxP="9999.0" voltageRegulatorOn="true" targetP="71.64102" targetV="1.04" targetQ="27.04592" bus="B1" connectableBus="B1">
                 <iidm:minMaxReactiveLimits minQ="-99990.0" maxQ="999900.0"/>
